file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-33-01-04 - LAVATORY LOUDSPEAKER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LAVATORY LOUDSPEAKER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the lavatory loudspeaker. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 23-33-01-000-801-A LAVATORY LOUDSPEAKER - REMOVAL LAVATORY LOUDSPEAKER - INSTALLA- ALL 23-33-01-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-33-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-33-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LAVATORY LOUDSPEAKER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the lavatory loudspeaker. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 262 Lavatory C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially 3/32 Allen wrench To open the loudspeaker panel assembly available E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the lavatory H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the PA circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) With a 3/32 Allen wrench, open the loudspeaker panel assembly. (2) Carefully disconnect the electric terminals (2). (3) Remove the screws (5) and washers (4). (4) Remove the loudspeaker (1). NOTE: When you remove the loudspeaker (1), be careful not to drop the loudspeaker grill (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-33-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Lavatory Loudspeaker Figure 401 B A C DET. A LOUDSPEAKER PANEL ASSEMBLY (REF.) 1. LOUDSPEAKER 5. SCREW (4) 2. ELECTRIC 4. WASHER (4) TERMINAL DET. B 3. GRILL ALLEN WRENCH LOUDSPEAKER DET. C PANEL ASSEMBLY (REF.) 145AMM230230.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-33-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-33-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. LAVATORY LOUDSPEAKER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the lavatory loudspeaker. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION PASSENGER CABIN LOUDSPEAKER - OPERATION- AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-803-A/500 AL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 262 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially 3/32 Allen wrench To close the loudspeaker panel assembly available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the lavatory I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the loudspeaker grill (3) in position. (2) Put the loudspeaker (1) in position. (3) Install the screws (5) and washers (4). (4) Carefully connect the electric terminals (2). (5) With an Allen wrench, close the loudspeaker panel assembly. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-33-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the PA circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it. (2) Do the Passenger Cabin Loudspeaker operational check ( AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-803-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-33-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
